title: Twitch blames server error for massive data leak - BBC News
description: The livestreaming site says a mistake exposed its data to a malicious third party on the internet.

title: Samsung apologises for Russian app download error - BBC News
description: The firm said a message sent to UK users saying Russian software had been installed was a mistake.

title: Tesla: Elon Musk says company headquarters will move to Texas - BBC News
description: Elon Musk announces that the most valuable car company in the world is moving away from California.

title: Insulate Britain: Protesters block Old Street roundabout and M25 junction - BBC News
description: Police make 35 arrests in the group's 12th day of protest in the past four weeks.
